short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unleash the full potential of LinkedIn with a clean, organised & AI powered CRM for your LinkedIn Account.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Your LinkedIn CRM built for sales professionals, recruiters, digital creators, marketers, investors and CEOs.

SocialInbox combines network and inbox management, and soon-to-come tasks, reminders, and AI management in one tool.

In a nutshell, SocialInbox helps you become proactive about your most valuable asset – your relationships. Engage your LinkedIn network rather than just grow it for the sake of growing it.

SocialInbox helps you:
🗂️ Centralize all your LinkedIn contacts in a lightweight CRM
🏷 Filter, sort & tag (label), your LinkedIn connections
📥 Organize your messy Inbox and never miss opportunities
📧 Send personalized messages at scale
🗝 Unlock data & signals from your network
⬇️ Export and bulk remove your LinkedIn connections
🤝 Find Email and Phone numbers from your network

No distractions. No ads. Just results & growth.

Why choose SocialInbox?

Here’s our story:

SocialInbox was founded in Zug 🇨🇭 Switzerland in 2023. With swiss privacy at it's core your data is always safe.

SocialInbox’s Key Features at a glance:

➼ Connection Manager

• Beautifully designed, CRM of your entire LinkedIn network
• Create & manage custom tags (labels), and assign them to each connection
• Write and apply custom notes with 1 click
• Filter groups of people that match your criteria with 15+ data points
• New data points: # of followers, last messaged, languages, birth dates, and more...

➼ SocialInbox Inbox

• List all your LinkedIn conversations without ads and distractions
• Apply and filter tags to focus only on relevant conversations
• Pin/Unpin 📌 and Star ⭐ your most important conversations
• Create/Save/Reuse message templates
• View LinkedIn Sales Navigator messages and have everything in one inbox

➼ + More

• Group follow & unfollow: Clean up lists of LinkedIn connections you follow and make your feed relevant again.
• 1-Click data export of filtered LinkedIn connection data into a. CSV file.
• Integrations – LinkedIn, Zapier, HubSpot (Coming soon)

We are committed to shipping features non stop and you can find onboarding on: https://onboarding.socialinbox.io 😍

🔒 How is SocialInbox different from other apps, and is it secure?

• We only work with connections that you approve of sending us.
• We don’t automate user actions.
• We use network native requests.
• SocialInbox resembles your LinkedIn DB.
• Your data is hosted securely in Switzerland and never shared with anyone, strict swiss privacy laws!
• We have no access to your personal data.
